DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of 600 mg daily oral dose of rifampin (CYP3A4 inducer) on the pharmacokinetics of a single 400 mg oral dose of nilotinib in healthy subjects
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of Nilotinib in Healthy Subjects
